 @ResponseBody
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)

                                                                                                                                          IncomingProductModel productModel,
                                                                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)

        Controller method to add new products to the database

        productModel - IncomingProductModel contains Product Company, Product Name and its version

        ProductModel
